description: T.1 & T.2 Beech - 2m Holistic crown reduction & deadwood.T.3 Maritime Pine - Deadwood & remove any damaged crossing limbs & hangers.T.4 Thuja - 1-2m Lateral reduction over driveway.T.5 Holm Oak -  2m Lateral reduction all round.T.7 Thuja - Deadwood.T.6 Atlantic Cedar -Reduce lowest scaffold limb by up to 2m and replace both existing braces. Remove major deadwood throughout crown and reduce selective laterals at higher risk of failure by up to 1.5m whilst maintaining natural crown shape & aesthetic.H.4 Mixed Hedge - Crown lift to 4m from ground level over public footpath.
